abstract: I. M. Pei's serene Terminal 6 has been empty for three years. By the end of October, it will be gone entirely - arguably the most significant loss of a transportation building in New York since Pennsylvania Station was razed.
snippet: I. M. Pei's serene Terminal 6 has been empty for three years. By the end of October, it will be gone entirely - arguably the most significant loss of a transportation building in New York since Pennsylvania Station was razed.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey

lead_paragraph: While ABC has conspicuously begun to celebrate the early jet age, the Port Authority has begun to tear it down.

headline.main: A Modern Masterpiece, No Longer Used, Will Soon Disappear at Kennedy Airport
